Perceptor:

"Yessss, yesss"hissed Proudly Perceptor"But remember that Hydras 
hasn't commanded her death... So by now she's a Predacon more but 
I'm a bit worried: Maximals might do an attempt to rescue her soon 
and I'm afraid that she isn't able to take herself... I wonder great 
Maxima"said Perceptor while he looked to her eyes"If you would train 
her... Don't worry she doesn't remember that she' was once a maximal 
or Rodimus's love, and a little trick will kill her if someone 
beyond me try to reprograme her... I just have the key to shut up 
the program that destroy her spark in case that Maximals try to 
reprogram her... I wonder if you can do me that little favor..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/21/03 1:13:26 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Perceptor smiled devilish and said "Then you will love this 
> > information... altought Rodimus is safe inside Maximal base, 
he's 
> > suffering a painful torture: we captured at his wife and now she 
> > serves to Hydras's cause under the name of Blackstorm with a 
> > ingenius reprogramation...."
> 
> "Is that so?" she sensually purred. She glanced at Perceptor then 
gazed up to 
> the ceiling, the smirk quickly removed as quickly as it 
appeared. "That is 
> still not enough," she growled with hate. 
> 
> Eventually, she would come up with a plan to pass along to 
Hydras .. the 
> demise of Rodimus Prime.
